languages.text: "Чело его было сокрыто печатью скорби и деяний прошлого, а голос подобен сыплющемуся песку".
"His brow bore the mark of sorrow and past misdeeds, and his voice was like seeping sand."
languages.original_text: "Чело его было сокрыто печатью скорби и деяний прошлого, а голос подобен сыплющемуся песку".

traits.locale_text: "His brow bore the mark of sorrow and past misdeeds, and his voice was like sliding sand."
traits.speaker: Chief

traits.locale_text: "His brow bore the mark of sorrow and past misdeeds, and his voice was like sliding sand."
traits.speaker: Chief

traits.locale_text: "His brow bore the mark of sorrow and past misdeeds, and his voice was like seeping sand."
traits.speaker: Chief

traits.locale_text: "His brow bore the mark of sorrow and past misdeeds, and his voice was like seeping sand."
traits.speaker: Chief

traits.locale_text: "His brow bore the mark of sorrow and past misdeeds, and his voice was like seeping sand."
traits.speaker: Chief

traits.locale_text: "His brow bore the mark of sorrow and past misdeeds, and his voice was like seeping sand."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: 「彼の額には悲しみと過去の悪行の証があった。声は砂がこぼれているかのようだった」
languages.original_text: "His brow bore the mark of sorrow and past misdeeds, and his voice was like seeping sand."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の額には悲しみと過去の悪行の証があった。声は砂がこぼれているかのようだった」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: “他的额头上烙着悲伤与过去罪行的痕迹，他的声音就像不断渗出的沙子。”
languages.original_text: "His brow bore the mark of sorrow and past misdeeds, and his voice was like seeping sand."

traits.locale_text: “他的额头上烙着悲伤与过去罪行的痕迹，他的声音就像不断渗出的沙子。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: « Son front portait la marque du chagrin et de méfaits passés, et sa voix était aussi fuyante que du sable qui glisserait entre les doigts. »
languages.original_text: "His brow bore the mark of sorrow and past misdeeds, and his voice was like seeping sand."

traits.locale_text: « Son front portait la marque du chagrin et de méfaits passés, et sa voix était aussi fuyante que du sable qui glisserait entre les doigts. »
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: «Su frente reflejaba la tristeza y los errores del pasado, y su voz era como arena que se filtraba».
languages.original_text: "His brow bore the mark of sorrow and past misdeeds, and his voice was like seeping sand."

traits.locale_text: «Su frente reflejaba la tristeza y los errores del pasado, y su voz era como arena que se filtraba».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Seine Stirn trug das Mal des Leids und früherer Missetaten, und seine Stimme war wie rieselnder Sand."
languages.original_text: "His brow bore the mark of sorrow and past misdeeds, and his voice was like seeping sand."

traits.locale_text: "Seine Stirn trug das Mal des Leids und früherer Missetaten, und seine Stimme war wie rieselnder Sand."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Çehresi hüzün ve geçmiş hataların izlerini taşıyordu, sesi de kayıp giden kumlar gibiydi."
languages.original_text: "His brow bore the mark of sorrow and past misdeeds, and his voice was like seeping sand."

traits.locale_text: "Çehresi hüzün ve geçmiş hataların izlerini taşıyordu ve sesi kayıp giden kumlar gibiydi."
traits.speaker: Chief
